channel.title: Wanna talk to a reporter about Carloop?
channel.description:
Hey folks,
I'm a freelance reporter named Jon Christian, over in Boston. I ran into Alan at Maker Faire this year, and I was struck by what an interesting and potentially huge concept Carloop is, especially after he kindly answered some of my rather dumb questions.
Anyway, I'd be really interested to hear about whatever you're working on, regardless of whether it's a huge ambitious project or you're just starting out or messing around. Feel free to reply here, or shoot me an email at jonathan (dot) a (dot) christian (at) gmail (dot) com.
Cheers,
JC

item.title: Wanna talk to a reporter about Carloop?
item.dc:creator: jvanier
item.description:
So if anybody else on the forum want to reach out to Jonathan, go ahead! He’s looking forward to hearing from you.

Read full topic
item.source: Wanna talk to a reporter about Carloop?
